extendedInfo.description: Colors! provides a fun and simple painting experience and invites the user to browse and participate in an online gallery consisting of countless beautiful paintings.SIMPLE BUT POWERFULDesigned to have a quick and non-intrusive workflow, Colors! provides the tools you need, without any of the distractions.INTEGRATED GALLERYHalf of the fun of painting is to show others the result. In Colors! you can easily upload your works to the vibrant Colors! community, or just share it on your favorite social network. Get feedback, make friends and participate in our regular painting challenges.PLAYBACK ANY PAINTINGColors! always records the full painting process. View your own playback, and branch it off at any point to take it in a different direction. Or view the playback of any painting in the gallery to learn from other artists.HIGH RESOLUTIONExport your works in high resolutions. Thanks to the resolution independent image-format that Colors! uses, it will make it look great for printouts.

reviews.title: Great art app, has just what I need.
reviews.comment: I used to think this app was pretty basic, but the new update with layers finally made it complete. My only issue is with the eye dropper tool when touching and holding the canvas. It really impedes on making little details correctly. The eye dropper is already in the main menu, so please make an option to turn this on and off.
reviews.author: Mitchell O\'Connor

reviews.title: Amazingly fun
reviews.comment: Its amazing though I don\'t like the fact that when I touch I the screen it draws to make it so its a s-pen option only galaxy note 2 version that\'d be awesome 5 stars
reviews.author: John Law

reviews.title: Pressure sensitivity
reviews.comment: I loved this app on my 3Ds but I don\'t like the way it draws with the s-pen or the way the eye drop tool works.
reviews.author: Ookami Aniyou

reviews.title: It could be better
reviews.comment: Thinner lines and tinnier points on the brush would be awesome for more precise draws great app.
reviews.author: Scakvso Nilrem

reviews.title: Very useful art app stands out from the rest
reviews.comment: Yes, it stands out because it has playback and you can see how the artist drew it. The community is also awesome. It also ties in with the PlayStation Vita and the Nintendo 3ds and DSi. In love it. Give it a try. I also have it on the Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1 and it really works well with it, except for the fact that it currently doesn\'t support portrait mode which is what I mostly use. Most drawing apps usually add portrait mode support at some point because of request. I need to email the developer about this.
reviews.author: Sherri Dalton

reviews.title: Really good app
reviews.comment: The nice thing about Colors! for Android is not seeing artwork made by Colors! 3D. To be honest, I like to be kept that way because there are a huge number of uploads over Colors! 3D. I have this version and the DS homebrew version. This app can see artwork made by the DS.  There are drawbacks here. Seeing the gallery with my Samsung Sratosphere always crashes. So it is deemed useless. However, it does work with my other Android device (WM8850 Netbook). I love the interface and it is beautifully designed.
reviews.author: Orlando Lopez

reviews.title: Finally
reviews.comment: An app with decent opacity settings and calibration. I can\'t import photos however....
reviews.author: Lynn Lim

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: Great app the drawing is hard but fun. The only problem I have is with the online art gallery. I can go to my gallery just fine, but when I try others it takes me back to my home menu. Please fix.
reviews.author: Hunter Thaxton

reviews.title: Pretty good execpt
reviews.comment: Really good, uber customizable! But how come the only place you can\'t save it in is you\'re gallery? please add this and it would be the best drawing app in my book!
reviews.author: suki nunni

reviews.title: Love Colors!!!
reviews.comment: Only thing I wonder if I want to do dots, I cant just touch? I must drag, which doesnt end up as nice.
reviews.author: Andre Darche

reviews.title: Layers!
reviews.comment: Thank you for finally adding layers! I can\'t work without \'em!
reviews.author: Alaric Weber

reviews.title: Add gallery search!
reviews.comment: Please add the ability to search the gallery for titles, #tags and @artists like on the ios version. Would also like to be able to see drawings from the 3ds, since it\'s possible in a web browser.
reviews.author: Elliott Salisbury

reviews.title: Why?
reviews.comment: Well I just got this app after I made an account on the website and each time I press the login button on the app it says get the full version and I just wanted to login can you fix this?
reviews.author: Kayla Motl

reviews.title: Michael
reviews.comment: Awesome
reviews.author: Michael Rodriguez

reviews.title: Pure awesome
reviews.comment: Nuff said. Its fun, easy, and playback is the best
reviews.author: bob barkin

reviews.title: Robust and fun sketch ap
reviews.comment: Nice interface and fun features.
reviews.author: Josh Suyemoto

reviews.title: Its ok
reviews.comment: Can u plz make the login free
reviews.author: Jose Gonzales

reviews.comment: Why does my nexus take so long to download things? I give up since it takes so long.\tCan you go on the same account on your 3ds?
reviews.author: sam horn

reviews.title: All about fun
reviews.comment: I have the 3D and the Android version cuz it\'s awesome and fun
reviews.author: Adan Velis

reviews.title: Eh
reviews.comment: It was okay but I would like more quality
reviews.author: Sophia Reitan
